name: Games.lol Download Box
author: Games.lol

sections.description:
Use a shortcode to insert a Games.lol download box anywhere in your website.

Shortcode format:

[gameslol_downloadbox gamename="{your-game-name|required}" class="{your-custom-classes|optional}"]
sections.installation:
1. Install and activate plugin.
  2. You may now use the new shortcode anywhere in your site.

Shortcode Format:

[gameslol_downloadbox gamename="{your-game-name|required}" class="{your-custom-classes|optional}"]

Go to Games.lol to view our games!

Attributes:

  • gamename – required, name/slug of the game to be displayed
  • class – optional, additional classes to be used for the download box, separate by spaces

Samples

[gameslol_downloadbox gamename="subway-surfers"]
  • display download box for game Subway Surfers
[gameslol_downloadbox gamename="subway-surfers" class="my-custom-class"]
  • display download box for game Subway Surfers with additional class ‘my-custom-class’

See screenshots for preview of samples.
sections.faq:
What is Games.lol?

Games.lol is your number one download site for free games for PC, Mac, and APK.

Where can we find the list of games?

You can go to the Games.lol website to see a list of our available games.

Are the games free?

All the games you will find at Games.lol are free for you to download and play. Games.lol believes in providing quality game-play to our users. We pride ourselves in only providing the best in Game titles from the world.
sections.changelog:
1.1 – 01/31/19

  • Updated to support star ratings.

1.0 – 01/30/19

  • Stable version uploaded to WordPress repository.

screenshots.caption: Use the Games.lol download box to embed game links to your pages!
Simple shortcode usage example: default download box, and another with custom css class.
Download boxes are responsive and will adapt to any container size.
